title: Years of Intoxication - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Aggressive Characters   Arrogant Characters   Blackmail   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Cheats   Cohabitation   Couple Growth   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Kidnappings   Lovers Reunited   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Mature Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Playboys   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   R*pe   S*x Friends   Showbiz   Stubborn Protagonist   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Shui Qian Cheng   水千丞
description:
Unrequited love is like a pot of strong wine. You know perfectly well that it will make you dizzy, let you lose yourself, and that it will be painful. Yet like moths to a flame, it is gladly endured.

You take care not to overdo it, but I will not stop until I get thoroughly drunk.

However, for any amount of drunkenness, one day I'll have to sober up.>
